trans-unit.source: Provides type converters for converting <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> objects to and from objects of other types.
trans-unit.target: 提供類型轉換器，轉換<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>物件與其他類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: See the base classes <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter> for important usage notes.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱基底類別<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter>的重要使用方式附註。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.ImageSourceTypeConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.ImageSourceTypeConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: See the base classes <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter> for important usage notes.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱基底類別<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter>的重要使用方式附註。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this converter can convert an instance of a specified type to a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出這個轉換器是否可以轉換指定型別執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: As implemented in this class, this method returns `true` only if `sourceType` is a <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: 在這個類別中實作時，這個方法會傳回`true`才`sourceType`為<xref:System.Uri>。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: `context`不使用參數。

trans-unit.source: See **Notes for Inheritors**.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱**繼承者注意事項**。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides contextual information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: The type of object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的物件類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if objects of the specified type can be converted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以轉換指定之型別的物件。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.ImageSourceTypeConverter"></xref> can convert a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> to an instance of a specified type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否此<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.ImageSourceTypeConverter"></xref>可轉換<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>指定型別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: As implemented in this class, this method returns `true` only if `destinationType` is a <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: 在這個類別中實作時，這個方法會傳回`true`才`destinationType`為<xref:System.Uri>。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: `context`不使用參數。

trans-unit.source: See **Notes for Inheritors**.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱**繼承者注意事項**。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides contextual information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: The type of object that you want to convert to a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 您想要轉換的物件型別<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the conversion is possible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可能，轉換否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Converts a specified object to a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件轉換<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 轉換期間所使用的語言和文化特性。

trans-unit.target: 已轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This method is called from this class instead of from a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從這個類別，而非從衍生類別呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The value is .
trans-unit.target: The value is .

trans-unit.source: The value is not a type that can be converted.
trans-unit.target: value 不可以轉換的類型。

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> to an object of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>指定型別的物件。

trans-unit.source: As implemented in this class, `value` must be a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別，以實作`value`必須<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>

trans-unit.source: As implemented in this class, `destinationType` must be a <xref:System.Uri> or the <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別，以實作`destinationType`必須<xref:System.Uri>或<xref:System.NotSupportedException>就會擲回。</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.target: 轉換期間所使用的語言和文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The object that you want to convert.
trans-unit.target: 您想要轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: The type that you want `value` converted to.
trans-unit.target: 您想要的類型`value`轉換成。

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Object> of the designated type.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.Object>指定之型別的。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: As implemented in this class, the object must be a <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: 在這個類別中實作時，此物件必須是<xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The object expresses the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the serialized image.

trans-unit.target: 當您將映像，就會發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of property descriptions for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之類型的屬性描述的集合。

trans-unit.source: This method is not implemented in this class—except to throw the exception.
trans-unit.target: 此類別中不會實作這個方法是，除了要擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: An object that you need property descriptions for.
trans-unit.target: 物件，您需要的屬性描述。

trans-unit.source: An array of attributes that are used to filter the returned collection in order to exclude irrelevant properties.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的陣列，可用來篩選傳回的集合以排除不相關的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that contains the property descriptions that are exposed for the component; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no property descriptions are returned.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref>其中包含元件; 公開的屬性描述或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果不傳回的任何屬性的描述。
